section.title: Influences
section.para: The history was chosen as one of the crucial elements of the game, thus we had to put a lot of effort in it and tried to create the real masterpiece. There aren't many games settled in steampunk world, but we can easily point them. However we didn't want to look for the inspirations only in video games. Some books and movies were significant to us and had an impact on the final product. Here's the complete list of our inspirations.

listitem.para: For Whom the Bell Tolls by Ermest Hemingway
